properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 9:04PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield
County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton.
* From late tonight until further notice.
* At 845 PM Monday the stage was 15.5 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* The creek is forecast to rise above flood stage after midnight
early Tuesday morning and then continue rising, reaching near 18.6
feet by Wednesday evening.
* At 16 feet, minor flooding begins in the Pastures and fields
upstream, right and left bank, from the Keiths Mill Road bridge, and
downstream on the left bank.

At 18 feet, minor flooding expands into the pastures, fields and
woodlands upstream and downstream from the Keiths Mill Road bridge.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
